content: WASHINGTON ON Semiconductor Corp  has won U.S. antitrust approval to buy Fairchild Semiconductor International  on condition that it sell an automotive ignition business  the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Thursday.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: ON Semiconductor wins conditional U.S. antitrust approval to buy Fairchild

content: WASHINGTON  Aug 25 ON Semiconductor Corp  has won U.S. antitrust approval to buy Fairchild Semiconductor International on condition that it sell an automotive ignition business  the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Thursday.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-ON Semiconductor wins conditional U.S. antitrust approval to buy Fairchild

content: WASHINGTON  Aug 25 ON semiconductor Corp  will divest its ignition IGBT semiconductor business as a condition of acquiring Fairchild Semiconductor International   the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Thursday.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: ON semiconductor to sell ignition IGBT semiconductors unit to acquire Fairchild -U.S. FTC

content: Feb 16 Fairchild Semiconductor International Inc  said the unsolicited offer it received from China Resources Microelectronics Ltd and Hua Capital Management Co Ltd in December was not superior to ON Semiconductor Corp's  deal.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: Fairchild says China Resources offer not superior to ON Semi's

content: Fairchild Semiconductor International Inc  said on Tuesday it had rejected an acquisition offer from China Resources Microelectronics Ltd and Hua Capital Management Co Ltd  citing concerns over the U.S. approval process.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: Fairchild rejects Chinese offer on U.S. regulatory fears

content: Jan 5 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2115 GMT on Tuesday:

title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Jan 5 Fairchild Semiconductor International Inc  said the revised unsolicited offer it received from China Resources Microelectronics Ltd and Hua Capital Management Co Ltd last week is superior to that of ON Semiconductor Corp .
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: Fairchild terms China Resources offer superior to ON Semi's

content: Dec 8 Chipmaker Fairchild Semiconductor International Inc said it received an unsolicited proposal to buy the company for about $2.46 billion.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: Fairchild Semiconductor gets $2.46 bln unsolicited bid

content: Nov 18 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2100 GMT on Wednesday:
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

content: ON Semiconductor Corp  is to buy Fairchild Semiconductor International Inc  for $2.4 billion to bolster its business of making power-management chips  the latest in a rapidly consolidating industry.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: Power chip maker ON Semi to buy Fairchild to head off competition

content: * Fairchild shares rise 9.4 pct to $19.56  ON slumps 11 pct   (Updates shares  adds analyst comment)
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 4-Power chip maker ON Semi to buy Fairchild to head off competition

content: Nov 18 ON Semiconductor Corp said it would buy Fairchild Semiconductor International Inc in a $2.4 billion deal  the latest in a rapidly consolidating semiconductor industry.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: ON Semiconductor to buy Fairchild in $2.4 bln deal

content: Oct 14 Fairchild Semiconductor International Inc  has hired Goldman Sachs Group Inc to find a buyer and is in talks with companies including ON Semiconductor Corp  and Infineon Technologies AG  Bloomberg reported.
name: ON Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Fairchild Semiconductor hires Goldman to find buyer - Bloomberg
